D Domain spell; Domains Charm, Water

sections.name: Water Affinity
sections.text: Undine sorcerers with the elemental (water) bloodline treat their Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer spells and class abilities. Undine clerics with the Water domain cast their Water domain powers and spells at +1 caster level.

Undines are humans whose ancestry includes elemental beings of water, such as marids. This connection with the Plane of Water is most noticeably manifested in their coloration, which tends to mimic that of lakes or oceans—all undines have limpid, blue eyes, and their skin and hair can range from pale blue-white to the deep blue or green of the sea.
Undines are both perceptive and agile, but tend to adapt rather than match force with force.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom, -2 Strength

sections.text: Undines have a swim speed of 30 feet.
sections.name: Speed

sections.text: Undines can see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.text: Hydraulic push 1/day. (Caster level equals the undine's total Hit Dice.)
sections.name: Spell-Like Abilities

sections.text: Undines begin play speaking Common and Aquan. Undines with high Intelligence scores can choose any of the following bonus languages: Auran, Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, Halfling, Ignan, and Terran.
sections.name: Languages
Undine
sections.text: Undines are defined by class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. Undines have the following racial traits.

description: This blue-haired, blue-skinned man moves with a liquid grace. His ears are fin-like, and his hands and feet are webbed.
name: Undine
